text: Is it correct to assume that only project mentors evaluate student proposal? Or other project member participate in the proposal evaluation?

elements.text: Is it correct to assume that only project mentors evaluate student proposal? Or other project member participate in the proposal evaluation?

text: This might help answer your question - <https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=YPO9ew6EkkU|GSoC'21 AMA> at  13:44.

elements.text: This might help answer your question -

text: Usually only mentors are invited to evaluate projects but certain mentors may share the proposal with other maintainers for a project

elements.text: Usually only mentors are invited to evaluate projects but certain mentors may share the proposal with other maintainers for a project

text: Thank you for the clarification. My mentor told me the weekly plans are not important for the proposal and I am a bit hesitant to skip them since I've seen others have include it in their proposal - I was dueling between if I should make the weekly plan or spend time on improving other parts of the proposal

elements.text: Thank you for the clarification. My mentor told me the weekly plans are not important for the proposal and I am a bit hesitant to skip them since I've seen others have include it in their proposal - I was dueling between if I should make the weekly plan or spend time on improving other parts of the proposal

text: Your mentor is your biggest advocate so if they don’t care for weekly timelines, you can skip it
